TopicTitle: [Request] Small landing craft for the Olympus 2

Articles.Content:
I'm in need of some small landing craft capable of atmospheric reentry to attach to the Olympus 2 interplanetary ship (which unfortunately doesn't have a thread ATM) as well as a launch vehicle to get it into a 100 km orbit. I must admit I have no idea how to build a proper space craft and I fly only with mechjeb. I have Olympus in orbit but I have no landing vehicles.

inb4makethemyourself

and I fly only with mechjeb.

Well, there's your problem. It is much easier to find design flaws when you, yourself is flying the ship, hence making it easier to make ships.

TL;DR: Stop using mechjeb for everything (unless you have already done those activites manually.)

There used to be some good designs before the forums got wiped out. Perhaps you should check out the spaceport and see if any were backed up there. Then you can fly practice missions to the mun to see which lander you like.
